articles.title: FD interest rates revised: Investors can earn up to 8.85% on FDs in this bank - The Economic Times
articles.description: RBL Bank offers interest rates between 3.50% to 8.10% for general citizens for FDs maturing between 7 days to 10 years. For senior citizens, the interest rate varies between 4% and 8.60%.
